air_calibration.docs:
The pmwcs3 probe can to be calibrated in dry/air conditions. The air calibration is a 30s procedure.

*See also: [`pmwcs3.air_calibration` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#pmwcs3-air-calibration-action)*

new_i2c_address.docs:
A new I2C address can be set (for multi-probes cases for example)

*See also: [`pmwcs3.new_i2c_address` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#pmwcs3-new-i2c-address-action)*

address.docs:
**, int**: New I2C address.

*See also: [PMWCS3 Capacitive Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#pmwcs3-new-i2c-address-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the pmwcs3 sensor.

*See also: [PMWCS3 Capacitive Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#pmwcs3-new-i2c-address-action)*

water_calibration.docs:
The pmwcs3 probe can to be also calibrated in water saturated conditions. Install the probe into a glass of water. The water calibration is also a 30s procedure.

*See also: [`pmwcs3.water_calibration` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#pmwcs3-water-calibration-action)*

address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x63`.

*See also: [PMWCS3 Capacitive Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#configuration-variables)*

e25.docs:
Electrical Conductivity, reference at 25°C in dS/m. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMWCS3 Capacitive Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#configuration-variables)*

ec.docs:
Electrical Conductivity in mS/m. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMWCS3 Capacitive Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
Soil temperature in °C. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMWCS3 Capacitive Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [PMWCS3 Capacitive Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#configuration-variables)*

vwc.docs:
Volumetric Water Content in cm3cm−3. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMWCS3 Capacitive Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmwcs3.html#configuration-variables)*
